message.body: Morning! I saw Michelle last night and told her you were interested in the dog-sits/walks. Give her a ring when you have a chance. I'm working the brunch bar till 4pm today if you're around. Guessing I'll have potatoes for you too. Fun hanging with you and D yesterday.
Cool, I called michell and left her a voice mail. If D's around drop off some spuds. Hope u had a good bday!
I had a great bday, actually. Lots of fun! Whatcha got going on later or tmrw eve? Dinner maybe?
I'm not sure what I'm doing yet this weekend but will try to keep things low key. If you have potatoes today my friend Chris said he will be going to the gallery and can pick them up for me.
No potatoes today. Sold out! I have avocado salsa, though. I'll see if D's home. Hope you get some rest this weekend. Talk soon. S.
Nice, but don't worry I'd D's not around. Hope your day wasn't too busy.

At D's now. I left a partially eaten crepe and a container of avo salsa. Might have potatoes tomorrow. I worked the bar and it was dead, but the restaurant was busy. It's super nice out. Hope you're enjoying your day!
Thanks! Today's not bad, hope you are able to enjoy it too
